text: 🚨57 million deaths prevented! 🚨 Thanks to accelerated immunization activities by countries, @WHO, the Measles & Rubella Partnership, and other intl partners, we've made huge strides in reducing global measles deaths! 💉🌎In 2022, 74% of children received both doses of the measles vaccine, and about 83% of the world's children received one dose by their first birthday. 🎉Let's keep up the good work! The @IA2030 Measles & Rubella Partnership is leading the charge to achieve the Immunization Agenda 2030 measles and rubella specific targets. 💪We can do this, world! 🌟 Let's work together to ensure a healthy future for all! 🌎❤️
